name: superfluousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being more than is needed or wanted: the superfluousness of half the things in the house See
superfluous
More examplesFewer examplesI had a strong sense of my own superfluousness at that point, and decided to leave. But as soon as one compares this language of smart commentary with the language of truth that also runs throughout this book, one is struck by the superfluousness of the former.In a tacit admission of its superfluousness, the service was closed down.He visibly resents his superfluousness on the biggest occasions golf has to offer.
